data.name: Modal Text
data.value:
Rapid Express BG EOOD is THE Choice for all your delivery needs in BULGARIA. Rapid Express BG EOOD is a Full-Service Courier Company that Works 24/7. We deliver any packages as well medical equipment and Animals, any size and anytime in Bulgaria. We provide reliable services, second to-non, geared toward your requirements. We deliver Satisfaction by offering DOOR-DOOR 24/7. All Packages will be delivered same day in a 24-hour frame time period, otherwise the delivery will be FREE of charge.

The following terms and conditions will be deemed to have been accepted by the User on usage of the website www.rapidexpress-bg.com. You are requested to read them carefully before you use the services of this site.

1. The term User shall refer to the user who is browsing the site. The term Rapid Express shall refer to Rapid ExpressBG EOOD. The term Site refers to http://www.rapidexpress-bg.com owned and monitored by Rapid Express BG EOOD.

2. By using the Site, you agree to follow and be bound by the following Terms and Conditions concerning your use of the Site. Rapid Express BG EOOD may revise the Terms of Use at any time without notice to you. Areas of the Site may have different Terms of use posted. If there is a conflict between the Terms of Use and Terms of Use posted for a specific area of the Site, the latter shall have precedence with respect to your use of that area of the site.

3. Rapid Express BG EOOD may terminate User’s Access at any time for any reason. The Provisions regarding the disclaimer of warranty, accuracy of information and indemnification shall survive such termination. Rapid Express BG EOOD may monitor access to the Site.

4. All content present on this Site is the exclusive property of Rapid Express BG EOOD. The software, text, Images, graphics, video and audio used on this site belong to Rapid Express BG EOOD. No material from this Site may be copied, Modified, reproduced, republished, uploaded, transmitted, posted or distributed in any form without prior written permission from Rapid Express BG EOOD. All rights not expressly granted herein are reserved. Unauthorized use of the materials appearing on this Site may violate copyright, trademark of Rapid Express BG EOOD. This trademark may not be used in any manner without prior written consent from Rapid Express BG EOOD.

5. Rapid Express BG EOOD does not make any warranties, express or implied, including, without limitation, those of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose, with respect to any information, data, statements or products made available on the Site.

6. The Site, and all the content, materials, Information, software, products and services provided on the Site, are provided on an “as is” and “ as available” basis. Rapid Express BG EOOD expressly disclaims all warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement.

7. Rapid Express BG EOOD shall have no responsibility for any damage to User’s computer system or loss of data that result from the download of any content, materials, information from the Site.

8. Rapid Express BG EOOD may change or discontinue any aspect of its website at any time, including its content or features. Rapid Express BG EOOD reserves the right to change the terms and conditions applicable to the use of the Site. Such changes shall be effective immediately upon notice, which shall be placed on the Site.

9. In no event will Rapid Express BG EOOD be liable for damages of any kind, including without limitation, direct, incidental or consequential damages ( including , but not limited to, damages for lost profits, business interruption and loss of programs or information) arising out of the use of or inability to use Rapid Express BG EOOD website , or any information provided on the website, or in the Products any claim attributable or errors, omissions or other inaccuracies in the Product or interpretations thereof. Some jurisdictions do not allow the limitation or exclusion of the liability. Accordingly, some of the above limitations may not apply to the User.

10. User agrees to indemnify, defend and hold Rapid Express BG EOOD harmless from and against all losses, expenses, damages and coast, including reasonable attorney’s fees, arising out of or relating to any misuse by the User of the content and services provided on the Site.

11. The information contained in the Site has been obtained from sources believed to be reliable. Rapid Express BG EOOD disclaims all warranties as to the accuracy, completeness or adequacy of such information.

12. Rapid Express BG EOOD makes no warranty: (A) the Site will meet your requirements; (B) the Site will be available on an uninterrupted , timely, secure, or error-free basis; (C) the results that may be obtained from the use of the Site or any services offered through the Site will be accurate or reliable.

13. The User’s right to privacy is of paramount importance to Rapid Express BG EOOD. Any information provided by the User will not be shared with any third party. Rapid Express BG EOOD reserves the right to use the information to provide the User a more personalized online experience.

14. The Site provides links to web sites and access to content, cookies, Products and services from third parties, including users, advertisers, affiliates and sponsors of the Site. You agree that Rapid Express BG EOOD is not responsible for the availability of, and content provided on, third party websites. The User is requested to peruse the policies posted by other websites regarding privacy and other topics before use. Rapid Express BG EOOD is not responsible for third party content accessible through the Site, including opinions, advice, statements and advertisements, and User shall bear all risks associated with the use of such content. Rapid Express EOOD is not responsible for any loss or damages of any sort User may incur from dealing with any third party.
